original_text: It is the same with people when they die. They will never rise to live again. As long as the sky remains above the earth, they will continue to sleep in death. It is the same with people when they die.
korean_text: 사람이 누우면 다시 일어나지 못하고 하늘이 없어지기까지 눈을 뜨지 못하며 잠을 깨지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: It is the same with people when they die.
They will never rise to live again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다시 살아나기 위해 일어나지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: As long as the sky remains above the earth,
they will continue to sleep in death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 죽음 속에서 계속 잠을 잘 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It is the same with people when they die.
